ROW.NAME: 有电力数据无缴税申报企业明细报表

ROW.DATDSC: select '' flag,a.id,a.name,a.town,sum(nvl(a.eleqty,0)) eleqty,max(a.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.town,a.eleqty,b.taxman from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where a.yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and a.yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') --and b.stat != '注销' and nvl(b.towns,' ') IN (select name from V_TAX_TOWNS WHERE ID like '[%TOWNS]%') --and nvl(a.town,' ') IN (select name from V_TAX_ELEAREA WHERE ID like '[%TOWNS]%') and a.usrid=b.ammno) a, (select * from tax_taxdata where yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]')) b where a.id=b.id(+) and b.id is null and eleqty !=0 and eleqty between decode('[%ELEQTY1]','',0,'[%ELEQTY1]') AND decode('[%ELEQTY2]','',90000000000,'[%ELEQTY2]') and (a.id like '%[%CMID]%' or a.name like '%[%CMID]%') group by a.id,a.name,a.town order by eleqty desc
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'

select id 编号,name 企业名称 ,eleqty 用电量,taxman 税管员, '<a href="ROOT_GXPG/show.sp?grdid=TAX_planstat" target=_blank>处理</a>' 操作 from( select a.id id,a.name name,sum(nvl(a.eleqty,0)) eleqty,max(a.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.eleqty,b.taxman from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where a.usrid=b.ammno) a, (select * from tax_taxdata) b where a.id=b.id(+) and a.yymm=b.yymm(+) and b.id is null and eleqty !=0 group by a.id,a.name order by eleqty desc )
